mapper.select: select * from kakao_login where k_nickname=#{k_nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and k_email=#{k_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into kakao_login(k_number, k_id, k_nickname, k_has_email, k_email, k_image, k_has_age_range, k_age_range, k_has_birthday, k_birthday, k_birthday_type, k_has_gender, k_gender) values(kakao_login_k_number_seq.nextval, #{k_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_has_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_has_age_range, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_age_range, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_has_birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_birthday_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_has_gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{k_gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
